summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1500, for the improvement of the west side of Prefontaine Place, in front of lot 2 and a portion of lot 1, block 17, D. S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks fifteen feet in width, also a portion of the east side of 3rd Avenue South by constructing a concrete sidewalk thereon, under Ordinance No. 16003. and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
